entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, introduced as a powerful and feared wizard who created Horcruxes to achieve immortality.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, mentioned as having defeated Voldemort's wand in a duel.

entities.name: resurrection stone
entities.description: A magical object that can bring back the dead, introduced as one of the Horcruxes created by Voldemort.

entities.name: hallow
entities.description: A group of powerful magical objects, including the Resurrection Stone, introduced as something Voldemort did not know about.

entities.name: olivander
entities.description: A wandmaker who was kidnapped by Voldemort, mentioned as having created wands with twin cores.

entities.name: little hangleton
entities.description: A location where a graveyard is located, mentioned as the site of a duel between Harry and Voldemort's wands.

entities.name: horcrux
entities.description: Magical objects created by Voldemort to achieve immortality, introduced as something he did not recognize in the Resurrection Stone.

entities.name: cloak
entities.description: A magical object that provides protection, mentioned as something Voldemort would not be interested in.

relationships.description: Voldemort created the Resurrection Stone as one of his Horcruxes, but did not recognize it.
Harry defeated Voldemort's wand in a duel at Little Hangleton.
Harry's wand defeated Voldemort's wand in a duel.
